questions.question: A retail company is considering moving their on-premises applications to AWS. Which of the following is a key BUSINESS advantage of this migration?
options: The ability to manage physical servers
Converting capital expenses to variable operational expenses

questions.question: A startup company needs computing resources that can automatically scale with user demand and only requires payment for actual usage. Which AWS cloud computing characteristic BEST meets these requirements?
A company needs to ensure that its AWS resources comply with industry regulations. Which AWS service should they use to continuously monitor their environment for compliance with security standards?
A system administrator needs to provide temporary access to the AWS Management Console for a contractor. Which approach represents the MOST secure method according to AWS best practices?
options: Create an IAM user with permanent credentials and required permissions
Create an IAM role with necessary permissions and allow the contractor to assume the role
Create a new AWS account for the contractor with full administrative privileges

questions.question: A company needs to host a website with varying traffic patterns and wants to minimize costs while ensuring availability. Which combination of AWS services would be MOST appropriate?
options: AWS Lambda and Amazon API Gateway

questions.question: A manufacturing company needs to store production data that is accessed frequently for the first month but is rarely accessed afterward. Which AWS storage solution would be MOST cost-effective?
options: Amazon EBS General Purpose SSD volumes

questions.question: A finance manager wants to receive notifications when AWS costs exceed expected thresholds. Which AWS service should be used to set up these alerts?
A company plans to run several EC2 instances continuously for the next three years. Which purchasing option would provide the MAXIMUM cost savings?

A retail company wants to build a highly available application that can handle unpredictable traffic spikes during flash sales. Which AWS service should they use to distribute traffic across multiple EC2 instances?

A healthcare organization needs to process sensitive patient data in AWS while maintaining compliance with regulations. Under the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, which security aspect is the customer's responsibility?
options: Physical security of AWS data centers
Patching of EC2 instance operating systems

questions.question: A media company needs to store large video files and make them available to users worldwide with low latency. Which combination of AWS services would BEST meet this requirement?
options: AWS Lambda and Amazon API Gateway

questions.question: A company wants to implement multi-factor authentication for users accessing the AWS Management Console. Which AWS service should they use?
A startup has unpredictable workloads and wants to reduce costs for non-critical batch processing jobs that can be interrupted. Which EC2 pricing model would be MOST cost-effective?
A company is deploying applications in multiple AWS Regions to achieve global reach and fault tolerance. Which AWS architectural principle does this approach BEST represent?
A company needs to run a short-term workload for data processing that will complete in less than 15 minutes. Which AWS service would be MOST cost-effective for this requirement?

A financial services company needs to ensure that their AWS resources are deployed only in regions that comply with specific regulations. Which AWS service should they use to enforce this requirement?

A retail company is migrating to AWS and needs to understand how responsibilities are divided between themselves and AWS. According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, which is an AWS responsibility?
options: Setting up network access control lists

questions.question: A company with multiple departments wants to track AWS usage costs by department while maintaining a single consolidated bill. Which AWS feature should they implement?
options: Resource tagging and tag-based cost allocation
AWS Trusted Advisor cost optimization checks
AWS Cost Explorer with custom reports

questions.question: A company wants to automatically back up data from their on-premises servers to AWS for disaster recovery purposes. Which AWS service should they use?
A company is deploying a new application and wants to test it in a development environment before releasing it to production. Which AWS best practice for cloud architecture should they follow?
options: Use only on-demand instances for all environments
Deploy directly to production to save time
Use infrastructure as code to create consistent environments
Share the same security credentials across all environments
